Talk10:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:Think_00>Hmm... Let's see.


I think you know how to catch them...
by sneaking up quietly from behind...
Talk11:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> hey, Link! Good for you, up and about
early in the morning.
Talk24:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Did you know that horses like carrots
and apples?

<sp:3:0:2:0101>So if a horse isn't warming up to you,
or if you have trouble catching it,
don't worry...
Unleash the snacks!
Talk12:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> hello, Link! Welcome back to
New Serenne Stable!
Talk25:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Did you know that horses all have
different abilities?

<sp:3:0:2:0101>First off, there's strength. The more stars
a horse has in that, the less likely it is to
lose its life.
You'll also want to keep an eye on its
speed, as well as its stamina, which is
how many times you can spur it on.
And then there's pull. That tells you how
good the horse is at towing things.

<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>If you attach a harness, your horse can
tow stuff for you. So the more stars it has
in pull, the better!
Lastly, don't forget about your bond with
the horse. If it's too low, your horse might
run away, so...
You gotta show your horse love by riding
it lots, soothing it lots, and feeding it lots!
LargeHorse: Will that fit in the stable?
Talk13:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> hey, Link! Good thing you got here
before sundown.
Talk26:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_00>Oh!<sp:5:0:0> Do you know how to tell a horse's
temperament from the pattern on its pelt?

Horses with <clr:0000>spots <clr:ffff>are docile and easier to
tame. That makes them easier to catch.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0101><snd:Happy_00>Ones that are <clr:0000>one color<clr:ffff> with no patterns
tend to be wilder and more difficult
to tame.
But they're faster and stronger, and you
can spur them on more!
Talk14:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>You're up late, Link! <sp:5:0:0>Trouble sleeping?
I've got the same problem.
Talk01:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> Link! Did you come to check in
on Zunk?

Since you worked so hard to make my
wagon complete, I promise...

I'll never <sp:5:1:0>EVER<sp:5:1:0> let anything happen to it!


<sp:3:0:2:0701>But is that all you wanted, or do you need
something from me?

<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I may not be of much help. Unless you
want to hear some of the things I know
about<clr:0000> horses<clr:ffff>...
Talk27:
<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS_00>Huh? Are you leaving already?


<sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Awww.<sp:5:1:0> Doesn't he know I'm a trove of knowledge
about horses? He'll miss out on all my hidden tricks
for handling them and stuff...<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk15:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oh,<sp:5:0:0> Link! You're gonna get wet!
Go inside! Hurry!
Talk28:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughS_01>Heheh.<sp:5:0:0> Talking to you always puts a
smile on my face, Link!

Makes me glad that I worked so hard
learning about <clr:0000>horses<clr:ffff>.
Talk16:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>It's so sweet of you to drop in and
visit Zunk!

You worked so hard to make my wagon
complete. I promise I'm taking care of it!

<sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:Notice_00>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>But was there something else you
came here for?

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Did you want me to tell you some things
about <clr:0000>horses<clr:ffff>?
BurnedCaravanWagon_02: <sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:SurpriseM>We have to put out that fire! <sp:5:0:0>Hurry!<sp:5:0:0>
Talk32:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>My precious horse-drawn wagon... I'm so
excited about it, I can't seem to drift off!<sp:5:0:0>

Thanks for completely ruining my
sleep cycle, Link.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Notice_00>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>I meant that as a compliment.


Hey, since I'm up anyway, wanna hear
<clr:0000>how to take care of horses<clr:ffff>?
BurnedCaravanWagon_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Ease_00>Phew...<sp:5:0:0> Thank goodness it didn't
get damaged.
Talk33:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Greeting>Welcome to New Serenne Stable! Awful
weather we're having, huh?
Talk20:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Good to know, right? I'm kind of an expert
on horses, so if you want to learn more,
just ask!
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000><clr:0200>Tee-hee.<sp:5:1:0> I won't reveal all my secrets at once.
Gotta keep him coming back!<clr:ffff><sp:0:2:2:6400>
BurnedCaravanWagon_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0901>Hey! <sp:5:0:0>Why are you being such a punk?
You could've destroyed my precious Zunk!

Don't EVER try something like that again!
